Package business_logic.sensor

Interface ISensor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSensor, BinarySensor, Sensor, SuperSensor, XMLSensor

    public interface ISensor
    Business interface : ISensor This interface allows both Sensor and SuperSensor to benefit from this methods
